Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: start
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The timer is setting the start time.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: warn
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The timer is setting the warning threshold.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: final
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The timer is setting the final countdown threshold.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: stringValue
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This returns strings, corresponding to the selected integers.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: hour
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the hour component of the picker (0)

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: minute
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the minute component of the picker (1)

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: second
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the second component of the picker (2)

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: PickerComponents
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The timer setup is accomplished via a picker control, with three sections: Hours (left), Minutes (center), and Seconds (right).

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: States
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: These enums determine the state of this screen

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _aboutViewSegueID
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The ID for the segue, to show the about screen.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _startTimerSegueID
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The ID for the segue, to start the timer.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _settingsPopoverWidthInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The size of the two settings popovers.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _fadeInAnimationPeriodInSeconds
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The period that we use for the “fade in” animation.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _selectionFadeAnimationPeriodInSeconds
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The period that we use for the selection fade animation.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _addTimerAnimationPeriodInSeconds
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The period that we use for the add timer animation.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _initialSettingsItemAlpha
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The starting alpha for our settings items, in the initial animation.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _pickerFont
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The size of the picker font

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _pickerCornerRadiusInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The size of the picker selection corner radius.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _defaultPickerViewDataRanges
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The ranges that we use to populate the picker (default).

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _maximumNumberOfTimers
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The maximum number of timers we can have.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _state
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The current screen state.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _selectionFeedbackGenerator
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This will provide haptic/audio feedback for subtle events.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _impactFeedbackGenerator
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This will provide haptic/audio feedback for more significant events.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: currentDisplayedPopover
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: If a popover is being displayed, we reference it here (so we put it away, when we ned to).

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: startupLogo
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The “startup” logo that we fade out.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: containerView
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is an “overall container” view. It mainly exists to fix an issue with the toolbar,

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: alarmSetBarButtonItem
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The set alarm popover bar button item.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: settingsBarButtonItem
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The settings popover bar button item.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: setupContainerView
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This contains the central timer setting area.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: topLabelContainerView
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The view that contains the four labels at the top of the settings area. It has a background color that changes for the state.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: stateLabel
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The state label, at the top of the settings area.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: hoursLabel
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The label over the hours wheel

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: minutesLabel
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The label over the minutes wheel

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: secondsLabel
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The label over the seconds wheel

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: setTimePickerView
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The timer set picker control.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: clearButton
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The button that sets the timer back to zero, and appears when there is a value in the picker.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: startSetButton
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The button to select the start time set state.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: warnSetButton
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The button to select the warning time set state.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: finalSetButton
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The button to select the final time set state.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: startButton
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the triangle button that starts the timer.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: bottomToolbar
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the toolbar on the bottom, with the timers.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: trashBarButtonItem
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the leftmost button, the trash icon.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: addBarButtonItem
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the rightmost button, the add button.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: backgroundLeftSwipeGestureRecognizer
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the left swipe (previous timer) gesture recognizer, applied to the main view.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: backgroundRightSwipeGestureRecognizer
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the right swipe (next timer) gesture recognizer, applied to the main view.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _currentTimer
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The current timer, routed from the settings.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _timerBarItems
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This will list our timer toolbar items.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _pickerViewData
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The ranges that we use to populate the picker.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: pickerTime
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the number of seconds currently represented by the picker.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: _stateTime(from:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Returns the currently limited value (warn can’t be higher than start, and final can’t be higher than either warn or start).

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called when the view hierarchy is set up. We use this to set our localizations and accessibility.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: viewWillAppear(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called when the view is about to appear.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: pressesBegan(_:with:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This allows Catalyst apps to use the keyboard to control the timer, like gestures.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: setUpToolbar()
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This sets up the toolbar, by adding all the timers.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: setUpButtons()
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This sets up the buttons and the picker to the current state.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: swipeGestureReceived(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The user swiped the timer. If there are multiple timers, it selects the next/previous one.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: clearButtonHit(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The clear button was hit.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: setButtonHit(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called when one of the state buttons is hit. It sets the screen state.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: trashHit(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called when the trash bar button item has been hit.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: addHit(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called when the add bar button item has been hit.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: startButtonHit(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: The timer start button was hit.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: displayAlarmSetupPopover(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is called, when someone selects the Alarm Set Bar Button.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: displaySettingsPopover(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is called, when someone selects the Settings Bar Button.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: selectToolbarItem(_:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called when the add bar button item has been hit.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: setAlarmIcon()
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This makes sure the alarm icon at the top, is the correct one.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: showAboutScreen()
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This shows the about screen.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: pickerView(_:rowHeightForComponent:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: All picker rows are the same height.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: pickerView(_:didSelectRow:inComponent:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is called when a row is selected.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: pickerView(_:viewForRow:forComponent:reusing:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This returns the view to display for the picker row.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This returns the accessibility label for the picker component.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: adaptivePresentationStyle(for:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called to ask if there’s any possibility of this being displayed in another way.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.name: adaptivePresentationStyle(for:traitCollection:)
Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: Called to ask if there’s any possibility of this being displayed in another way (when the screen is rotated).

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The height of the popover, in display units, if voiceover is running.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: _regularHeightInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The height of the popover, if voiceover is not running.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: _selectionFeedbackGenerator
Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This will provide haptic/audio feedback for popover events.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The storyboard ID for this controller.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This references the presenting view controller.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: popoverStartImmediatelySwitch

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The label for the switch is actually a button.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: toolbarContainerStackView
Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The container for the toolbar display prefs.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: popoverDisplayToolbarSwitch

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The container stack view for the auto-hide switch.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: auotHideIndentLabel
Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: A label that acts as a “shim” for the auto-hide switch. We hide this, for Mac.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The label for the switch is actually a button.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: timerModeSegmentedSwitch
Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The segmented switch that indicates whether digital or stoplight mode.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: aboutAmbiaMaraButton
Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The button that shows us the about screen.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: settingsPopoverHeightInDisplayUnits
Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The popover height.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: Called when the hierarchy has loaded. We use this to set the screen up, and apply accessibility.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: Called just before the screen disappears.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The auto-hide switch, or its label, was hit.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The size of the picker font

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The padding on either side of the labels we use as picker rows.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The storyboard ID for this controller.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: _audioPlayer
Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This is the audio player (for sampling sounds).

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: _selectionFeedbackGenerator
Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This will provide haptic/audio feedback for subtle events.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This aggregates our available sounds.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: _isSoundPlaying
Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: If true, then the currently selected sound is playing.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This references the presenting view controller.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.name: alarmModeSegmentedSwitch
Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The segmented switch that controls the alarm mode.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The stach view that holds the vibrate switch.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The label for the switch is actually a button, that toggles the switch.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The picker view for the sounds. Only shown if the seg switch is set to sound.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: The popover height. We adjust for the missing switch, if vibrate is not available.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: Called when the hierarchy has loaded. We set up the initial states, and all the localization and accessibility.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: Called just before the screen disappears.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This is called when a row is selected.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: Called when the sound is done playing.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: setTimerTo(location:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Sets the timer to the given percentage.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _timeSetSliderViewBottomContraintConstant
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The distance from the bottom of the time set slider to the toolbar or the bottom of the screen.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _pausedLEDColor
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The color for the digital display, when in “Pause” mode.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _pausedStoplightAlpha
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The opacity of the “traffic lights,” when in “Paused” mode.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _activeStoplightAlpha
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The opacity of the currently active “traffic light,” when the timer is running.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _inactiveStoplightAlpha
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The opacity of the currently inactive “traffic lights,” when the timer is running.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _startLEDColor
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The color of the digits, when the timer is running, and is still in “Start” mode.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _warnLEDColor
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The color of the digits, when the timer is running, and is in “Warn” mode.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _finalLEDColor
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The color of the digits, when the timer is running, and is in “Final” mode.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _flashDurationInSeconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The animation duration of the screen flashes.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _alarmDurationInSeconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The repeat rate of the alarm “pulses.”

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _clockPeriodInSeconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The time between timer checks.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _leewayInMilliseconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The number of milliseconds to allow for timer leeway.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _autoHidePeriodInSeconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The number of seconds to wait before the toolbar auto-hides.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _autoHideAnimationDurationInSeconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The period of the auto-hide duration.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _timer
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The main timer instance.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _alarmTimer
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The timer that is set when the alarm is sounding.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _autoHideTimer
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The timer that is used to trigger auto-hide (Toolbar On, Auto-Hide Working).

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _audioPlayer
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This is the audio player (for playing alarm sounds).

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _soundSelection
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This aggregates our available sounds.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _startingTime
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: When the timer is started (or continued), the initial time is set here.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _tickTimeInSeconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This contains the elapsed time since start, in seconds.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _selectionFeedbackGenerator
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This will provide haptic/audio feedback for continues and ticks.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _feedbackGenerator
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This will provide haptic/audio feedback for gestures, alams, and transitions.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _isAlarming
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: True, if the timer is currently in “alarm” state.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _isSoundPlaying
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: If true, then the currently selected sound is playing.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _lastActivityTime
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This is used for the toolbar auto-hide.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _timeSetSlider
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: If the slider is up, it will be stored here.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This is the main view, containing the digital display.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: digitalDisplayViewHours
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The hours digit pair.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: digitalDisplayViewMinutes

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: digitalDisplayViewSeconds
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The seconds digit pair.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: controlToolbar
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This is the toolbar that may (or may not) be displayed at the bottom of the screen.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: playPauseToolbarItem
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The “Play” of “Pause” toolbar button.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: stopToolbarItem
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The “Stop” toolbar button.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: fastForwardBarButtonItem

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: rewindToolbarItem
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The “Rewind”/“Previous Timer” toolbar button.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: timerIndicatorToolbarItem
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The button in the center of the toolbar that indicates the timer index (if we have multiple timers).

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: blurFilterView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The filter that gives the “gas blur” effect.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: hexGridImageView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The image that displays the “hex grid” over the digital display.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: flasherView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The view across the back that is filled with a color, during a “flash.”

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: digitContainerInternalView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The stack view that contains the digit pairs.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: stoplightsContainerView

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: startTrafficLightImageView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The “traffic light” that is displayed during the “Start” phase of the timer.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: warnTrafficLightImageView

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: finalTrafficLightImageView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The “traffic light” that is displayed during the “Final” phase of the timer.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The view that is used to detect a long-press, and will contain the slider to set the time.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: In order to maintain the proper aspect ratio of the digit pairs, we need to ensconce them in container views.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: minutesContainerView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: In order to maintain the proper aspect ratio of the digit pairs, we need to ensconce them in container views.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: secondsContainerView
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: In order to maintain the proper aspect ratio of the digit pairs, we need to ensconce them in container views.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The constraint for the bottom of the slider. We move it around, if we display the toolbar.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This creates an array of CGPoint, based on a 0,0 origin, that describe

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: _getHexPath(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This returns a CGMutablePath, describing a “pointy side up” hexagon.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This class generates an overlay image of a faint “hex grid” that allows us to simulate an old-fashioned “fluorescent” display.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Called when the hierarchy is loaded.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Called when the view will rearrange its view hierarchy.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Called when the view is about to disappear.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This prepares the time set slider.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This sets up the toolbar, by adding all the timers.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This initializes the timer screen.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: fastForwardHit()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Fast forward will either sto the alarm, or cascade to the next timer.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: rewindHit()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Rewind will either reset the alarm, or cascade to the previous timer.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: stopAlarm()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This stops the alarm, sets the timer to zero, and pauses it.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: startTimer()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This starts the timer from scratch.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: resetTimer()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This sets the timer to scratch, but does not start it.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: finishTimer()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This sets the timer to scratch, but does not start it.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: pauseTimer()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Pauses the timer, without resetting anything.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: continueTimer()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Continues the timer, setting the counter to the last time.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: stopTimer()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Stops the timer, by popping the screen.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: stopSounds()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Stops any playing sounds.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: setTimerDisplay()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This sets up the timer display, according to the time and the settings.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: determineStoplightColor(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This determines the proper color for the digit “LEDs.”

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: determineDigitLEDColor(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This determines the proper color for the digit “LEDs.”

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: flashIfNecessary(previousTickTime:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This will flash the screen, for transitions between timer states.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: flashCyan()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This flashes the screen briefly cyan (pause)

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: flashGreen()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This flashes the screen briefly green

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: flashYellow()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This flashes the screen briefly yellow

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: flashRed()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This flashes the screen briefly red

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: flashTimerNumber(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This flashes the current timer number, in an expanding and fading image.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: setDigitalTimeAs(hours:minutes:seconds:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This sets the digits, directly.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: setDigitDisplayTime()
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This calculates the current time, and sets the digital display to that time.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: playThisSound(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This plays any sound, using a given URL.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: backgroundTapped(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Called if the background was tapped. This is how we start/pause/continue the timer. This only works for toolbar hidden.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: rightSwipeGestureReceived(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The user right-swiped the timer. This only works for toolbar hidden.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: leftSwipeGestureReceived(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The user left-swiped the timer. This only works for toolbar hidden.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: leaveDisplay(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The double-tapped the timer, signifying that we will return to the set screen. This only works for toolbar hidden.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: longPressGestureDetected(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: The long-press on the bottom of the screen was detected.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: toolbarItemHit(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: One of the toolbar controls was hit.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: basicGCDTimerCallback(_:)
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: Called when the timer fires.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.name: _watermarkAlpha
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.abstract: The alpha to use for normal contrast (center image “watermark”).

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.name: _watermarkSizeCoefficient
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.abstract: The sizing coefficient to use. This compares against the screen size (center image “watermark”).

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.name: _backgroundGradientImage
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.abstract: This can be overloaded or set, to provide the image to be used as a background gradient.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.name: _watermarkImage
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.abstract: This can be overloaded or set, to provide the image to be used as a “watermark.”

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.name: _myCenterImageView
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.abstract: This is the background center image view.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.abstract: Called when the view hierarchy has been completed.

Classes/RVS_AboutAmbiaMara_ViewControlle.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/RVS_AboutAmbiaMara_ViewControlle.abstract: Called when the hierarchy has loaded. We set up the text and localization.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: timers
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: The timers, stored as a Dictionary (key is the ID).

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: timerIDs
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: The timer IDs, stored as an Array. This is how we order the timers.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: currentTimerIndex
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: The current selected timer index. -1 is no timer selected.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: useVibrate
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: If true, then the alarm will use haptics (vibration), in devices that support it.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: alarmMode
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: The alarm mode. It will store one of the AlarmSoundMode values as an Int.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: selectedSoundIndex
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: The selected sound. This is a 0-based index (Int).

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: startTimerImmediately
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: If this is true, then going into the running timer screen starts the timer immediately.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: displayToolbar
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: If this is true, the running timer toolbar is displayed at the top of the screen.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: stoplightMode
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: If this is true, then the running display will be three “traffic lights,” instead of a digital display.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: autoHideToolbar
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: If this is true, then the toolbar (if in displayToolbar mode) will fade, after a few seconds of inactivity.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: allKeys
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: These are all the keys, in an Array of String.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.name: KVP
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.abstract: This has the timer settings in a Key-Value-Pair (KVP) fashion, for storage.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.name: id
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.abstract: The ID, which is set from a UUID.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.name: startTimeAsComponents
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.abstract: The start time (as hours, minutes, and seconds)

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.name: warnTimeAsComponents
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.abstract: The warning time (as hours, minutes, and seconds)

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.name: finalTimeAsComponents
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.abstract: The final time (as hours, minutes, and seconds)

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.name: TimerSettings
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/TimerSett.abstract: This struct contains the current settings for the timer.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.name: Keys
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings/Keys.html.abstract: This is an enumeration that will list the prefs keys for us.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: ids
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: This returns the timer IDs, as an Array. This is how we deal with ordering the timers, since they are stored as a Dictionary.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: currentTimerIndex
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: The current index into the Array of timers (so 0-based), of the currently selected timer.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: currentTimerID
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: The ID of the currently selected timer.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: useVibrate
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: If true, then the alarm will use haptics (vibration), in devices that support it.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: alarmMode
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: The alarm audio mode. If true, then there will be an audible alarm.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: selectedSoundIndex
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: The selected sound, for an alarm. This is a 0-based index.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: startTimerImmediately
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: If this is true, then going into the running timer screen starts the timer immediately.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: displayToolbar
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: If this is true, then the toolbar is shown at the top of the running timer.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: stoplightMode
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: If this is true, then the running display will be three “traffic lights,” instead of a digital display.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: autoHideToolbar
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: If this is true, then the toolbar (if in displayToolbar mode) will fade, after a few seconds of inactivity.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.name: add(timer:andSelect:)
Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html#/s:1.abstract: Add the timer to storage. If the timer is already in storage, it is updated.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_AppSceneDelegate.h.abstract: This closes any open popovers, and also stops any alarms.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_AppSceneDelegate.h.abstract: Called when the app is resigning active

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_AppSceneDelegate.h.abstract: Called when the app is about to become active.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_Settings.html.abstract: This class stores our timer settings as app persistent storage.

Classes/RVS_AboutAmbiaMara_ViewControlle.abstract: This is the view controller for the about screen.

Classes/RVS_AmbiaMara_BaseViewController.abstract: This is a base class that provides a background gradient, and “watermark” image.

Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.name: RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewController
Classes/RVS_RunningTimerAmbiaMara_ViewCo.abstract: This is the view controller for the running timer screen.

Classes/RVS_SetAlarmAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This is the view controller for the alarm setup popover.

Classes/RVS_SettingsAmbiaMara_PopoverVie.abstract: This is the view controller for the about screen.

Classes/RVS_SetTimerAmbiaMara_ViewContro.abstract: This is the view controller for the setup screen, where the timer is set, and started.

Global%20Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global%20Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
